title: Family Register Sampler, 1798
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation
inscribed: Alicia Lawrence's Work Wrought in the 12th year of her age 1798
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Purchased at Mercur sale.
creditline: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
description:
A record of the family of William Lawrence and Alice Ripley. The entire ground is covered in black cross-stitch, with the family dates worked in colored silks, followed by a verse and inscription, and at the bottom two cornucopias of flowers. 
The verse reads: 
Improve Every Moment of youth while you 
May For Life is too short to Be trifled away

tombstone.epitaph:
Family Register Sampler, 1798.
1798. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation. Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers. 2008-31-14-a,b.
